DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Must able understand sign inform consent form approve Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee Evidence corneal epithelial defect pathology affect corneal rigidity Use topical ophthalmic medication ( except artificial tear ) History corneal surgery Any condition would prevent inhibit intraocular pressure measurement use iCare pneumotonometry Evidence ocular infection 30 day prior enrollment Allergy proparacaine latex
